# Analysis Report: fraolb/flappy-celo-farcaster

Generated: 2025-08-29 21:39:45

The provided code digest for "Flappy Rocket" is a play-to-earn web3 game built on the Celo network with Farcaster integration. After a thorough analysis, it has been determined that there is **no integration with Self Protocol** in the provided codebase. The project focuses on wallet connection (Wagmi, Coinbase, MetaMask), Farcaster frames, a custom smart contract for CELO rewards, and a MongoDB backend for scores and user plays.

Therefore, all scores related to Self Protocol features will be 0.
